description:
slice through various unique levels full of mind-clicking experience. Use fun to explore gameplay mechanics to combine thinking with slicing.

Key Features:

* 225 unique levels
* Minimalistic visual design
* Challenging and rewarding puzzles
* Light and Dark versions of levels
* Fun to discover gameplay mechanics
* Original, atmospheric music
* Meditative atmosphere
name: SLICE
intro: SLICE is a 2D game where you slice objects to solve puzzles.
